Reviews.Title: Worst buy ever
Reviews.Author: Enoh
Reviews.Content: The photos are dark, you cannot see anything, and the zoom lens doesn't zoom. it has a cheap plastic feel to it. its a pity i could not return this camera, would have done so immediately, but unfortunately i had it shipped to me in Nigeria.I would advise everyone to stay AWAY from this camera.

Reviews.Title: terrible camera
Reviews.Author: Chanda
Reviews.Content: this camera sucks, please dont waste you money on this because you will regret it, the pictures come out terrible!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
8MP digital camera
4X digital zoom
2560x2160 pixel CMOS sensor
2.4-Inch color display
TV output
ProductInfo.Name: COBRA DIGITAL DC8650RD 8.0 Megapixel 3-in-1 Digital Camera (Red)
